metadata.title: Flash Mints (Ricky Powell - Genesis Collection) #1
metadata.description: Introducing Ricky Powell's first complete NFT collection: Ricky Powell ‘Genesis Collection’, Composed of 2,021 unique NFT editions of Ricky Powell's photographs (Each NFT is numbered with a serial number proving its authenticity). This collection represents a portion of Ricky Powell’s private collection of photos that he’s shot from over the years. Each NFT tells a story from Ricky Powell's perspective about the shot and unlocks exclusive benefits, rewards, and surprises for all NFT holders of this collection.
